kepano/40-questions.summary: Recent activities in the kepano/40-questions repository include a pull request event on December 4, 2024, where a translated version of 40 questions to ask yourself every year and decade in Malayalam (ml) was added by kepano, enhancing the repository's content and language support.

profile_summary: As a multidisciplinary professional with a background in design and research, I leverage my technical skills in HTML and CSS to drive innovative solutions, with a growing network of 12 peers and a portfolio of 8 public repositories showcasing my active development endeavors. With a unique blend of human-centered design and technical expertise, I approach problems with a creative and analytical mindset. I'm committed to continuously expanding my skill set and exploring new technologies to deliver effective and user-friendly experiences.
